channel.title: Runeremix - Looking for Testers/ideas
channel.description:
Hey
I need feedback on some of the ideas I'm working on.
And test out the server while I'm working.
For now I'm working on the site and working out the ideas I have. So for those who would like to help me in this procces, feel free to join me on the forum or reply here.
All Ideas are posted here: [url=http://"http://runeremix.com/news.php"]runeremix.com/news.php[/url] (All ideas that include custom items will be ignored)
Some pictures:
It's one server, but multiple worlds. A world can be hosted anywhere (all server we use are free, hosted by me or some friends). In this example world 4 has a very low ping, this is because the server is hosted at my own house. You always keep your progress while switching a world. Friend chat does show you friends in others worlds with world number and you can PM them. [img]http://puu.sh/9fdjn/93b983055e.png[/img] Clan chats is missing, I am going to add it soon, with cross world chat like PM's. [img]http://puu.sh/9fdz7/6f55b6f541.png[/img]
We have full screen options. [img]http://puu.sh/9fdqg/b4c11b849c.png[/img]
Flexz

item.title: Runeremix - Looking for Testers/ideas
item.dc:creator: @Flexz Flexz
item.description:
@Flexz wrote:

Hey

I need feedback on some of the ideas I’m working on.

And test out the server while I’m working.

For now I’m working on the site and working out the ideas I have.
So for those who would like to help me in this procces, feel free to join me on the forum or reply here.

All Ideas are posted here: runeremix.com/news.php
(All ideas that include custom items will be ignored)

Some pictures:

It’s one server, but multiple worlds. A world can be hosted anywhere (all server we use are free, hosted by me or some friends). In this example world 4 has a very low ping, this is because the server is hosted at my own house.
You always keep your progress while switching a world. Friend chat does show you friends in others worlds with world number and you can PM them.

Clan chats is missing, I am going to add it soon, with cross world chat like PM’s.

We have full screen options.

Flexz
